name: The Other Half (itch) (Bkush)
description:
A puzzle platformer utilizing the theme of 'joined together' for the GMTK game jam. The game takes you through a little journey of a character that lost his other half. In order to get back what he lost he has to join other blocks to fulfill the smile in each level. Then, there is a little twist at the end. I hope you enjoy playing!

Controls are regular controls: Movement - A/D, Left/Right Jump - W, Space, Up

If when you click run game, and it stays at a black screen for a few seconds it is just loading, don't worry! 

Also don't forget to check out the devlog, you can find it in the 'About' page in the game.
